As a double-sided freestanding object it can be viewed from both sides or rotated, leading to diverse design possibilities. It can be hung on a wall with a Klash Kradle. Materials: acrylic (plexiglas) Dimensions: 15” x 15” x 3” This piece is sold. Please inquire if you want something like it.
